fields.label: Set Default Featured Image Thumbnail
fields.name: global_blog_featured_image_thumbnail
fields.instructions:
The Featured Image Thumbnail image will be shown for blog posts on the main blog page and on other pages that list out blog articles.

You can upload a thumbnail image for individual blog posts, but we recommend uploading a default image here in case you forget to upload a thumbnail image on a blog post. This default thumbnail image will only be used in the event the thumbnail image is not set for a specific blog post.

Directions: Upload an image that is 370px x 370px.

fields.label: Display Author's Picture?
fields.name: global_blog_display_authors_picture
fields.instructions:
The author's picture is displayed on blog posts that the author has published. If you would like to display a picture of the author, you can upload the author picture by going to users > and then selecting the user you would like to upload a picture for. Once in the user settings, scroll down the page and look for the About Yourself section. The image size should be 100px x 100px

If you do not want to display the author picture, leave the box below unchecked.

fields.label: Enable Sidebar For All Blog Posts?
fields.name: global_page_enable_sidebar
fields.instructions: This will enable the sidebar for all blog posts.   You can over-ride this on individual blog posts if you would like.
